featured.text: The island continues to recover from its 1992 visit from Iniki, the most powerful hurricane to hit Hawaii this century.
It was at the end of one of these long voyages that the pineapple came to Hawaii to stay.

definition.zh_def: 夏威夷是美國的一個州，由多個島嶼組成，位於太平洋中部，以其熱帶氣候和美麗的海灘聞名。
definition.en_def: Hawaii is a U.S. state composed of many islands located in the central Pacific, known for its tropical climate and beautiful beaches.
definition.example: We are planning a vacation to Hawaii next summer.
